resources.string: Password must be more than 6 characters

string-array.name: FAQuestion
string-array.item: How to find out BMI Status?

string-array.name: FAQAnswer
string-array.item: You can generate food reccomendation by clicking recomendation button in main menu then you can click generate recommendation if you want generate recommendation
You can see on the main menu or you can click profile button on the main menu then you can see your BMI status on the profile section
You can update food preferences by clicking the liked button on a food. After it you can re generate the recommendation to get new recommendation
